verses.verse: <WG2532> I saw, <WG1492> and <WG2532> behold, <WG2400> the Lamb <WG721> standing <WG2476> on <WG1909> Mount <WG3735> Zion, <WG4622> and <WG2532> with <WG3326> him <WG846> a number, <WG1540> one hundred forty <WG5062> - four <WG5064> thousand, <WG5505> having <WG2192> his <WG846> name, <WG3686> and the name of his Father, <WG3962> written <WG1125> on <WG1909> their <WG846> foreheads. <WG3359>

<WG2532> I heard <WG191> a sound <WG5456> from <WG1537> heaven, <WG3772> like <WG5613> the sound <WG5456> of many <WG4183> waters, <WG5204> and <WG2532> like <WG5613> the sound <WG5456> of a great <WG3173> thunder. <WG1027> <WG2532> The sound <WG5456> which I heard <WG191> was like that of harpists <WG2790> playing <WG2789> on <WG1722> their <WG846> harps. <WG2788>

<WG2532> They sing <WG103> <WG5613> a new <WG2537> song <WG5603> before <WG1799> the throne, <WG2362> and <WG2532> before <WG1799> the four <WG5064> living creatures <WG2226> and <WG2532> the elders. <WG4245> <WG2532> No one <WG3762> could <WG1410> learn <WG3129> the <WG1487> song <WG5603> except <WG3361> the one hundred <WG1540> forty <WG5062> - four <WG5064> thousand, <WG5505> those who <WG3588> had been redeemed <WG59> out <WG575> of the earth. <WG1093>

These <WG3778> are <WG1526> those who <WG3739> were <WG3435> not <WG3756> defiled <WG3435> with <WG3326> women, <WG1135> for <WG1063> they are <WG1526> virgins. <WG3933> These <WG3778> are <WG1526> those who <WG3588> follow <WG190> the Lamb <WG721> wherever <WG3699> <WG99999> he goes. <WG5217> These <WG3778> were redeemed <WG59> by Jesus from <WG575> among men, <WG444> the first fruits <WG536> to God <WG2316> and <WG2532> to the Lamb. <WG721>
<WG2532> In <WG1722> their <WG846> mouth <WG4750> was found <WG2147> no <WG3756> lie, <WG1388> for <WG1063> they are <WG1526> blameless. <WG299>

<WG2532> I saw <WG1492> an <WG243> angel <WG32> flying <WG4072> in <WG1722> mid heaven, <WG3321> having <WG2192> an eternal <WG166> Good News <WG2098> to proclaim <WG2097> to those who dwell <WG2730> on <WG1909> the earth, <WG1093> and <WG2532> to every <WG3956> nation, <WG1484> <WG2532> tribe, <WG5443> <WG2532> language, <WG1100> and <WG2532> people. <WG2992>

He said <WG3004> with <WG1722> a loud <WG3173> voice, <WG5456> "Fear <WG5399> the Lord, <WG2316> and <WG2532> give <WG1325> him <WG846> glory; <WG1391> for <WG3754> the hour <WG5610> of his <WG846> judgment <WG2920> has come. <WG2064> <WG2532> Worship <WG4352> him <WG3588> who made <WG4160> the heaven, <WG3772> <WG2532> the earth, <WG1093> <WG2532> the sea, <WG2532> and <WG2281> the springs <WG4077> of waters! <WG5204>"

<WG2532> Another, <WG243> a second angel, <WG32> followed, <WG190> saying, <WG3004> "Babylon <WG897> the great <WG3173> has fallen, <WG4098> <WG4098> which <WG3754> has made <WG4222> all <WG3956> the nations <WG1484> to drink <WG4222> of <WG1537> the wine <WG3631> of <WG1537> the wrath <WG2372> of her <WG846> sexual immorality. <WG4202>"

<WG2532> Another angel, <WG32> a third, <WG5154> followed <WG190> them, <WG846> saying <WG3004> with <WG1722> a great <WG3173> voice, <WG5456> "If <WG1487> anyone <WG5100> worships <WG4352> the beast <WG2342> and <WG2532> his <WG846> image, <WG1504> and <WG2532> receives <WG2983> a mark <WG5480> on <WG1909> his <WG846> forehead, <WG3359> or <WG2228> on <WG1909> his <WG846> hand, <WG5495>

<WG2532> he <WG846> also will drink <WG4095> of <WG1537> the wine <WG3631> of the wrath <WG2372> of God, <WG2316> which <WG3588> is prepared <WG2767> unmixed <WG194> in <WG1722> the cup <WG4221> of his <WG846> anger. <WG3709> <WG2532> He will be tormented <WG928> with <WG1722> fire <WG4442> and <WG2532> sulfur <WG2303> in the presence <WG1799> of the holy <WG40> angels, <WG32> and <WG2532> in the presence of <WG1799> the Lamb. <WG721>

<WG2532> The smoke <WG2586> of their <WG846> torment <WG929> goes up <WG305> <WG1519> forever <WG165> and ever. <WG165> <WG2532> They have <WG2192> no <WG3756> rest <WG372> day <WG2250> and <WG2532> night, <WG3571> those who <WG3588> worship <WG4352> the beast <WG2342> and <WG2532> his <WG846> image, <WG1504> and <WG2532> whoever <WG1536> receives <WG2983> the mark <WG5480> of his <WG846> name. <WG3686>
Here <WG5602> is <WG2076> the patience <WG5281> of the saints, <WG40> <WG5602> those who keep <WG5083> the commandments <WG1785> of God, <WG2316> and <WG2532> the faith <WG4102> of Jesus. <WG2424>"

<WG2532> I heard <WG191> the voice <WG5456> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772> saying, <WG3004> <WG3427> "Write, <WG1125> <WG3107> 'Blessed are the dead <WG3498> who <WG3588> die <WG599> in <WG1722> the Lord <WG2962> from now on. <WG534>'" "Yes, <WG3483>" says <WG3004> the Spirit, <WG4151> "that <WG2443> they may rest <WG373> from <WG1537> their <WG846> labors; <WG2873> for <WG1161> their <WG846> works <WG2041> follow <WG190> with them. <WG3326>"

<WG2532> I looked, <WG1492> and <WG2532> behold, <WG2400> a white <WG3022> cloud; <WG3507> and <WG2532> on <WG1909> the cloud <WG3507> one sitting <WG2521> like <WG3664> a son <WG5207> of man, <WG444> having <WG2192> on <WG1909> his <WG846> head <WG2776> a golden <WG5552> crown, <WG4735> and <WG2532> in <WG1722> his <WG846> hand <WG5495> a sharp <WG3691> sickle. <WG1407>

<WG2532> Another <WG243> angel <WG32> came <WG1831> out from <WG1537> the temple, <WG3485> crying <WG2896> with <WG1722> a loud <WG3173> voice <WG5456> to him <WG3588> who sat <WG2521> on <WG1909> the cloud, <WG3507> "Send forth <WG3992> your <WG4675> sickle, <WG1407> and <WG2532> reap; <WG2325> for <WG3754> the hour <WG5610> to reap <WG2325> has come; <WG2064> for the <WG4671> <WG2325> harvest <WG2326> of the earth <WG1093> is ripe! <WG3583>"
<WG2532> He <WG3588> who sat <WG2521> on <WG1909> the cloud <WG3507> thrust <WG906> his <WG846> sickle <WG1407> on <WG1909> the earth, <WG1093> and <WG2532> the earth <WG1093> was reaped. <WG2325>

<WG2532> Another <WG243> angel <WG32> came <WG1831> out from <WG1537> the temple <WG3485> which is <WG3588> in <WG1722> heaven. <WG3772> He <WG846> also <WG2532> had <WG2192> a sharp <WG3691> sickle. <WG1407>

<WG2532> Another <WG243> angel <WG32> came <WG1831> out from <WG1537> the altar, <WG2379> he who has <WG2192> power <WG1849> over <WG1909> fire, <WG4442> and <WG2532> he called <WG5455> with a great <WG3173> voice <WG2906> to him <WG3588> who had <WG2192> the sharp <WG3691> sickle, <WG1407> saying, <WG3004> "Send forth <WG3992> your <WG4675> sharp <WG3691> sickle, <WG1407> and <WG2532> gather <WG5166> the clusters <WG1009> of the vine <WG1093> of the earth, <WG3754> for the earth <WG846>'s grapes <WG4718> are fully ripe! <WG187>"

<WG2532> The angel <WG32> thrust <WG906> his <WG846> sickle <WG1407> into <WG1519> the earth, <WG1093> and <WG2532> gathered <WG5166> the vintage <WG288> of the earth, <WG1093> and <WG2532> threw <WG906> it into <WG1519> the great <WG3173> winepress <WG3025> of the wrath <WG2372> of God. <WG2316>

<WG2532> The winepress <WG3025> was trodden <WG3961> outside <WG1854> of the city, <WG4172> and <WG2532> blood <WG129> came <WG1831> out from <WG1537> the winepress, <WG3025> even to <WG891> the bridles <WG5469> of the horses, <WG2462> as far as <WG575> one thousand <WG5507> six hundred <WG1812> stadia. <WG4712>
